ID.description: A guid that is the unique identifier of the item

Class_01.description: Item class code referring to ItemClasses with ClassID 1

Class_02.description: Item class code referring to ItemClasses with ClassID 2

Class_03.description: Item class code referring to ItemClasses with ClassID 3

Class_04.description: Item class code referring to ItemClasses with ClassID 4

Class_05.description: Item class code referring to ItemClasses with ClassID 5

Class_06.description: Item class code referring to ItemClasses with ClassID 6

Class_07.description: Item class code referring to ItemClasses with ClassID 7

Class_08.description: Item class code referring to ItemClasses with ClassID 8

Class_09.description: Item class code referring to ItemClasses with ClassID 9

Class_10.description: Item class code referring to ItemClasses with ClassID 10

CopyRemarks.description: Copy sales remarks to sales lines

CostPriceCurrency.description: The currency of the current and proposed cost price

CustomField.description: Custom field endpoint. Provided only for the Exact Online Premium users.

EndDate.description: Together with StartDate this determines if the item is active

ExtraDescription.description: Extra description text, slightly longer than the regular description (255 instead of 60)

GLCosts.description: GL account the cost entries will be booked on. This overrules the GL account from the item group. If the license contains 'Intuit integration' this property overrides the value in Settings, not the item group.

GLCostsCode.description: Code of GL account for costs

GLRevenue.description: GL account the revenue will be booked on. This overrules the GL account from the item group. If the license contains 'Intuit integration' this property overrides the value in Settings, not the item group.

GLStock.description: GL account the stock entries will be booked on. This overrules the GL account from the item group. If the license contains 'Intuit integration' this property overrides the value in Settings, not the item group.

GLStockCode.description: Code of GL account for stock

GrossWeight.description: Gross weight for international goods shipments

IsBatchItem.description: Indicates if batches are used for this item

IsFractionAllowedItem.description: Indicates if fractions (for example 0.35) are allowed for quantities of this item

IsMakeItem.description: Indicates that an Item is produced to Inventory, not purchased

IsNewContract.description: Only used for packages (IsPackageItem=1). To indicate if this package is a new contract type package

IsPackageItem.description: Indicates if the item is a package item. Can only be created in the hosting administration

IsPurchaseItem.description: Indicates if the item can be purchased

IsRegistrationCodeItem.description: Indicated if the item is used in voucher functionality

IsSalesItem.description: Indicates if the item can be sold

IsSerialItem.description: Indicates that serial numbers are used for this item

IsStockItem.description: If you have the Trade or Manufacturing license and you check this property the item will be shown in the stock positions overview, stock counts and transaction lists. If you have the Invoice module and you check this property you will get a general journal entry based on the Stock and Costs G/L accounts of the item group. If you don't want the general journal entry to be created you should change the Stock/Costs G/L account on the Item group page to the type Costs instead of Inventory. If you have the CRM Standalone license, the item will not be available.

IsSubcontractedItem.description: Indicates if the item is provided by an outside supplier

IsTaxableItem.description: Indicates if tax needs to be calculated for this item

IsTime.description: Indicates if the item is a time unit item (for example a labor hour item)

IsWebshopItem.description: Indicates if the item can be exported to a web shop. If you have the CRM Standalone license, the item will not be available.

ItemGroup.description: GUID of Item group of the item

NetWeight.description: Net weight for international goods shipments

NetWeightUnit.description: Net Weight unit for international goods shipment, only available in manufacturing packages

Picture.description: This field is write-only. The picture can be downloaded through PictureUrl and PictureThumbnailUrl.

PictureThumbnailUrl.description: Url where thumbnail picture can be retrieved

PictureUrl.description: Url where picture can be retrieved

StartDate.description: Together with EndDate this determines if the item is active

Unit.description: The standard unit of this item

UnitType.description: Type of unit: A=Area, L=Length, O=Other, T=Time, V=Volume, W=Weight
